nodes.bodyText:
This file contains bidirectional Unicode text that may be interpreted or compiled differently than what appears below. To review, open the file in an editor that reveals hidden Unicode characters. Learn more about bidirectional Unicode characters


  


    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            [cygnus-ngsi][HDFSSink] Separate files by property periodicity.
          
          
            
            [cygnus-ngsi][HDFSSink] Separate files by property periodicity (#1830)
          
      
    
    
  

Please remember to include the number of issue being fixed (in the case we have one) ;)
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -3,4 +3,5 @@
 [cygnus-ngsi][PostGRESQLSink] Fix schemaName when inserting data into DB
 [cygnus-common][PostgreSQL, MySQL] SQL error persistance (#1791)
 [cygnus-ngsi][PostgisSink] Enable postgis functions without native types flag on.
-[cygnus-ngsi][RestHandler] Add a not null validation for ngsiVersion header of request.
\ No newline at end of file
+[cygnus-ngsi][RestHandler] Add a not null validation for ngsiVersion header of request.
+[cygnus-ngsi][HDFSSink] Separate files by property periodicity.

@@ -3,4 +3,5 @@

-[cygnus-ngsi][RestHandler] Add a not null validation for ngsiVersion header of request.
\ No newline at end of file
+[cygnus-ngsi][RestHandler] Add a not null validation for ngsiVersion header of request.
+[cygnus-ngsi][HDFSSink] Separate files by property periodicity.

nodes.bodyText: This has been included in this PR? Or it's a gap (i.e. something developed in aprevious PR but not documented until now)?
nodes.diffHunk: @@ -268,6 +268,7 @@ NOTE: `hive` is the Hive CLI for locally querying the data. | Parameter | Mandatory | Default value | Comments | |---|---|---|---| | type | yes | N/A | Must be com.telefonica.iot.cygnus.sinks.NGSIHDFSSink | +| attr_metadata_store | no | true | If true, it will store metadata as usual. If false it will not store metadata regardless of the `file_format` type |

nodes.bodyText: Just moved it a little bit up on the list.

Ah, ok, I didn't realize the deleted L302 line.
NTC
